name: Mattress and Bed Frame
description: Client has chronic kidney disease, diabetes, and a history of stroke. He ambulates with a quad stick at home, has unsteady gait, and has high fall risk. He requires a wheelchair when moving around in the community, especially for longer distances. He stays with his older sister in a 2-room rental flat. Both of them are unemployed. He is sleeping on two mattresses stacked on top of each other at the moment. The hospital's Occupational Therapist has concluded that client requires a normal mattress and bed frame with the above dimensions.
specifications: Bed and bed frame height: 18 inches and higher Bed and bed frame length: 80-81 inches Bed and bed frame width: 40 inches

name: Sofa
description: This is a family composed of two 70+ years old elderly clients. The husband is suffering from terminal cancer and is undergoing chemotherapy. Since there is no other source of income in the household, they are currently in need of a sofa. The previously donated second-hand sofa is now damaged. They are hoping to find new donors who can contribute any form of sofa. Would appreciate if donor can cover transport costs. Please WhatsApp messages Hsin Yu at 8911 8058 or email to hsinyu_lee@viriya.org.sg to liaise.
